name: vbc-explorer
description: A modern blockchain explorer for VirBiCoin network with NFT support, contract verification, and real-time statistics
author: Aoi Emerauda

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .env && rm -rf .env.local && rm -rf .env.development.local && rm -rf .env.test.local && rm -rf .env.production.local
scripts.sync: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/sync.js
scripts.stats: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/stats.js
scripts.richlist: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/richlist.js
scripts.tokens: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/tokens.js
scripts.price: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/price.js
scripts.cleanup-accounts: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/cleanup-accounts.js
scripts.sync-tokens: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/sync-tokens-to-contracts.js
scripts.all: npm run build-tools && cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" node dist/tools/sync.js all
